refnamediv.refpurpose: Something a person is interested in

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The interest element describes something that a person is interested in. A common use for interest elements is to list hobbies.

refsect2.title: Formatting
refsect2.para: The formatting of interest is more complex than that of many other elements. The title is always displayed first, in standard font. Then, if there is a description, and the interest.description.format parameter value is single-line, a period and a space (. ) are displayed. Finally, the description is output, formatted according to the interest.description.format parameter.

refsect2.title: Parents
refsect2.para: interest may be contained in these elements: <$PARENTS$>

informalexample.programlisting: <interest> <title>Seattle Mariners</title> <description> <para>I'm a season ticket holder.</para> <para><emphasis>GO MARINERS!</emphasis></para> </description> </interest>
